name: bmm-app
description: App for Android and iOS to play content from BMM

scripts.uitests-a-base: appcenter test run uitest --app-path BMM.UI.Android/bin/Release/org.brunstad.bmm.apk --build-dir BMM.Tests/BMM.UITests/bin/Release --app BCC-IT-Services/BMM-Android --locale en_US
scripts.uitests-android: npm run uitests-a-base -- --devices BCC-IT-Services/daily-droid --test-series manual --include-category Android
scripts.uitests-a-manifest: appcenter test prepare uitest --app-path BMM.UI.Android/bin/Release/org.brunstad.bmm.apk --build-dir BMM.Tests/BMM.UITests/bin/Release --artifacts-dir AppCenterArtifacts
scripts.uitests-i-base: appcenter test run uitest --app-path BMM.UI.iOS/bin/Release/BMM.ipa --build-dir BMM.Tests/BMM.UITests/bin/Debug --app BCC-IT-Services/iOS --locale en_US
scripts.uitests-i-a: npm run uitests-i-base -- --devices BCC-IT-Services/two --test-series manual --include-category iOS

author: BCC IT Services
